UCV.name: Digital.ai Agility
UCV.description: Digital.ai.Agility is Enterprise level planning and tracking platform to build agile practices that scale across the  enterprise.

UCV.name: HCL AppScan Enterprise (ASE)
UCV.description: AppScan Enterprise delivers scalable application security testing and risk management capabilities, to help enterprises  manage risk and compliance. AppScan enables security, DevOps teams to collaborate, establish policies, and perform  testing throughout the application development lifecycle. The AppScan Enterprise plug-in imports scan results to  insights.

notes: Changed the passsword type to secure
Removed Manual User Access Key: From current version onwards this plugin will only support Auto Generated User Access Key feature of HCL Accelerate.

Initial Sync Date Field Added: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for the HCL Appscan Enterprise plugin an Initial Sync Date field is added. This field is optional and can be used only for the first sync.

Added WorkflowId: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for HCL Appscan Enterprise plugin a Workflow ID field is added. This field is optional and can be used to provide HCL Accelerate WorkflowId - the ID of a Value Stream (VSM )to which HCL Appscan Enterprise vulnerability data is associated.
Preventing Installation on Older Versions: This version of HCL Appscan Enterprise Plugin can only be installed on HCL Accelerate version 3.0.0 and later
Added logic to support ASE version to 10.0.0
Feature Enhancement: sync new scan from lastSyncDate for any application
Bug Fix: In earlier version of plugin data into HCL AppScan Enterprise Issues metrics was not showing in VSM.

UCV.name: HCL AppScan on Cloud (ASoC)
UCV.description: HCL AppScan on Cloud (ASoC) is an application security offering that allows you to scan a web URL for security  vulnerabilities.

notes: enabling webhook support and pulling historic data
Auto-generated user access key related changes
Removed Manual User Access Key: From current version onwards this plugin will only support Auto Generated User Access Key feature of HCL Accelerate.

Initial Sync Date Field Added: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for the ASoC plugin an Initial Sync Date field is added. This field is optional and can be used only for the first sync.

Added WorkflowId: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for ASoC plugin a Workflow ID field is added. This field is optional and can be used to provide HCL Accelerate WorkflowId - the ID of a Value Stream (VSM )to which ASoC vulnerability data is associated.
Preventing Installation on Older Versions: This version of ASoC Plugin can only be installed on HCL Accelerate version 3.0.0 and later

Making scheduled event optional: The scheduled event - Sync ASoC Data has been made optional from this version onwards. To enable the scheduled event please check the box in integration properties with label Run as a Scheduled Event.
Segregated Static scan and Dynamic scan data
The Older Version of ASoC Plugin was not reporting critical issues
The Older Version of ASoC Plugin was not reporting critical issues

UCV.name: Azure DevOps
UCV.description: Azure DevOps (formerly Microsoft Team Foundation Server (TFS) or Microsoft TFS)provides services to manage end-to-end  flow of a development project. It contains services to share code, track work, and ship software.

notes: bug fixes for issues in sync deployments
Added Deployment Orchestration Support for Azure Release pipeline

UCV.name: BitBucket Cloud
UCV.description: BitBucket Cloud is a source code version control repository hosting service owned by Atlassian. It contains tools to manage source code for a project.

notes: added multiple repositories support in repoName
Removed Manual User Access Key: From current version onwards this plugin will only support Auto Generated User Access Key feature of HCL Accelerate.
Added Category:SCM is the category of bitbucket cloud plugin .

Initial Sync Date Field Added: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for the plugin an Initial Sync Date field is added. This field is optional and can be used only for the first sync.

UCV.name: BitBucket Server
UCV.description: BitBucket Server is a source code version control repository hosting service owned by Atlassian. It contains tools to manage source code for a project.

notes: Added support to pull commits from multiple additional branches
Enhancements done to the UI fields
Removed Manual User Access Key: From current version onwards this plugin will only support Auto Generated User Access Key feature of HCL Accelerate.
Added Category:SCM is the category of bitbucket server plugin .

Initial Sync Date Field Added: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for the plugin an Initial Sync Date field is added. This field is optional and can be used only for the first sync.
Fix Resync Functionality: The previous version of plugin had some bug in resyc functionality.
Infinite Loop Bug Fix: The previous version of the plugin had some bug that was making plugin events run in an infinite loop.
API Rate Limiting Implemented: Plugin has been enhanced to better handle API rate limiting.
Additional Logs Added: Additional debug, trace and warn logs are added to the plugin.
Error Handling: No default branch is defined - error is shown in warning logs if there is no default branch for a repository.
Performance Improvement: Plugin functionality is improved, previous version of the plugin was making more rest API calls to the BitBucket Server.

UCV.name: Black Duck
UCV.description: Black Duck by Synopsys identifies open source related vulnerabilities in applications and containers. It tracks the open  source in code, mitigate security and license compliance, and automates enforcing open source policies.

notes: Added build URL to link scan results with VSM

UCV.name: CircleCI
UCV.description: CircleCI is a modern continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) platform. CircleCI automates build, test, and deployment of software.

notes: Clarifying delimitation problem for properties used
Removed Manual User Access Key: From current version onwards this plugin will only support Auto Generated User Access Key feature of HCL Accelerate.
Preventing Installation on Older Versions: This version of Circleci Plugin can only be installed on HCL Accelerate version 3.0.0 and later
Added Category:Build and Deploy are the plugin category of Circleci.

Initial Sync Date Field Added: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for the plugin an Initial Sync Date field is added. This field is optional and can be used only for the first sync.

UCV.name: Code Coverage
UCV.description: The Code Coverage plug-in allows for parsing of data from several code coverage tool. Included are LCOV, Cobertura,  JaCoCo, and Clover data.

UCV.name: Cucumber
UCV.description: Cucumber is a software testing tool that runs automated acceptance tests written in a behavior-driven development (BDD)  style. BDD testing focuses on the behaviour of the product.

UCV.name: GitHub Dependabot
UCV.description: Github Dependabot plug-in scans package dependency vulnerabilities as Dependabot alerts from GitHub.

notes: Syncs with GitHub Plugin to get Dependency Vulnerabilities

UCV.name: IBM Engineering Workflow Management (EWM)
UCV.description: The IBM Engineering Workflow Management (EWM) plug-in, previously known as the IBM Rational Team Concert, provides  integration with the IBM Workflow Management (EWM) server. This plug-in imports work items from an IBM EWM server to an  DevOps Velocity value stream map.

notes: Added change sets related data to history section of VSM dot.

UCV.name: Fortify SSC
UCV.description: Fortify Software security center (SSC) enables teams with the application security program automation capabilities. It enables to manage, develop, and provide security for the software protection activities.

notes: Added WorkflowId: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for the plugin a Workflow ID field is added. This field is optional and can be used to provide WorkflowId - the ID of a Value Stream (VSM )to which the vulnerability data is associated.

Added WorkflowId: Under the hidden properties section of add integration page for the plugin a Workflow ID field is added. This field is optional and can be used to provide WorkflowId - the ID of a Value Stream (VSM )to which the vulnerability data is associated.

UCV.name: GitHub
UCV.description: GitHub is a Git repository hosting service. It provides tools to manage artifacts on the Git repository. The GitHub  plug-in imports Git artifacts based on queries for issues, commits and pull requests.

notes: Pull commit data from non master branch
Auto-generated User Access Key support added
Auto-generated User Access Key support added
Bug fix: UAK support for older versions
Primary and secondary API rate limit fix
Removed Manual User Access Key: From current version onwards this plugin will only support Auto Generated User Access Key feature of HCL Accelerate.
Meta data plugin updates for VSM onboarding:In index.js file added categories and added idRegExp fields
Bug fix: Previous version was failing for upload commit of large size.
Feature: Syncing Yaml files from different repositories
Wild Card feature for additional branches field in GitHub Plugin

Enhancement: This enhancement modifies the plugins synchronization behavior following a failure. Previously, the plugin would resume syncing from the date of the last successful synchronization. Now, it has been updated to continue syncing commits, pull-requests, and issues from the point where it last synced before the failure. This change ensures more accurate and efficient data synchronization by reducing the likelihood of missing or duplicating data in cases where the plugin had partially synced before encountering an issue.

UCV.name: GitLab
UCV.description: GitLab provides management of git repositories. The GitLab plug-in imports issues, commits, merge requests and builds  from a GitLab server.

notes: Pulls commit from non-master & included issues
Added history to Issues and PR
Removed Manual User Access Key: From current version onwards this plugin will only support Auto Generated User Access Key feature of HCL Accelerate.
Preventing Installation on Older Versions: This version of GitLab Plugin can only be installed on HCL Accelerate version 3.0.0 and later.

Resolved Previous Version Issue: Previous Version of plugin had some defect realted to Project Names field. The plugin was syncing data only for those projects which were owned by the user. Now the plugin syncs data for the projects in which user is a member at any level.
Added Category: ALM | SCM | Build | Deploy are the categories of GitLab plugin.
Resolved 502 Bad Gateway Error: Previous version of plugin was giving a 502 Bad Gateway error for GitLab Server.
Minor Bug Fix: Previous version of plugin was giving Cannot read property status of null error.
Fix for Project Name Field: Previous version of Gitlab plugin was not able to import data for some projects.

Project IDs Field Added: To import the source data you need to provide a list of GitLab Project IDs. Please note that you must provide at least one of either Project Names or Project IDs and can provide both if needed.
Minor bug fix: Dynamically getting type of Issue.

UCV.name: Handlebar Reporter
UCV.description: Handlebars is a simple templating language. It can be used to generate HTML or other text formats from a template and  input object.

notes: Release to upgrade the plugin with base image
Add DB Support for Seeded Reports
Updated API Client for major product release.
Remove required UAK in favor of dynamically generated UAK

UCV.name: Jenkins
UCV.description: A new plug-in for Jenkins works as any other plug-ins of DevOps Velocity. The old plugin has been renamed to Jenkins (Legacy). The Jenkins plug-in pull jobs from Jenkins and provide as an Input to the release pipelines and as an automation task in deployment plan.

notes: Fix integration name not showing in pipeline stage task selection
Fix external build link not appearing in deployment plan task
Add revision to builds for proper dot linking
Added support for process parameters coming from Git Parameter and Active Choices plugins
Warning logs added for skipping unsupported process parameters
Fix for Build-Revision mismatch in Jenkins Integration
Use correct username on task completion

UCV.name: Jira
UCV.description: Jira is an issue tracking product, developed by Atlassian. The Jira plug-in provides an integration with Jira to import  and work with Jira work items.

notes: Removed the display of auth token in error logs
Auto-generated User Access Key support added
Bug fix: UAK support for older versions
Added Initial Sync date from core
Initial Sync Date Removed from Plugin side
Previous Version Bug Fix: Previous versions of the plugin had a bug due to which plugin was giving 401 error.
Added Category: Application lifecycle management (ALM) is the category of Jira plugin.
Deployment plan task added for release process: Deployment plan task created in order to release selected version in the task.
Minor Bug Fix: Previous version of plugin was failing with ECONNREFUSED error.
Bug Fix: Earlier version of the Plugin could not handle 429 error (too many requests). Now it is handling it.
Fixed version-check bug in jira plugin
Bug fix:First automation task was failing and also updated integration configuration property description.

UCV.name: Apache JMeter
UCV.description: Apache JMeter is a testing tool to analyze and measure web application performance. The JMeter plug-in imports the test results  data in DevOps Velocity metrics.

UCV.name: JUnit
UCV.description: JUnit provides a testing framework for the Java programming language. The JUnit plug-in imports the test results data in  DevOps Velocity metrics.

UCV.name: Planview Leankit
UCV.description: The Planview Leankit plugin processes incoming data from Planview LeanKit server.

UCV.name: Milestone Risk Estimator
UCV.description: The Milestone Risk Estimator plug-in represents an innovative Machine Learning(ML) solution designed to enhance value stream management by providing accurate sprint risk estimates. The projected outcomes are presented through metrics, enabling more effective sprint management for increased productivity.

UCV.description: Rational Test Automation Server is a fully-containerized (Docker) server component used by test teams to consolidate  testing from each of the Test Workbench products into a single view.

UCV.name: SAP ChaRM
UCV.description: The SAP ChaRM plug-in will sync SAP Normal Changes in SAP's Change Request Management with Jira issues .

notes: Initial release syncs SAP Normal changes with Jira issues

UCV.name: ServiceNow
UCV.description: The ServiceNow plug-in for IBM DevOps Velocity automates the importing of ServiceNow incident management(Beta),  change management and problem management data from a ServiceNow server.

notes: Minor bug fix: Fixed bug related to proxy server change and related to automation task execution.
Bug fix: The previous version was failing to upload issues of large size.
Minor enhancement: Previously, the number of issues per page was fixed, but now it is configurable. You can modify the number of issues per page to fetch.
Feature enhancement: In automation task enabled to create and update change task.
Bug fix: Fixed issue related to syncing of change and problem in servicenow schedule event.
Minor bug fix: Earlier plugin was unable to resync when incident is resolved

UCV.name: Shell
UCV.description: The Shell plug-in for IBM DevOps Velocity automates the task in releases.

notes: Minor enhancement in code: Enabled to throw error logs while executing shell automation task.

UCV.name: Snyk
UCV.description: The Snyk plug-in scans GitHub , GitLab and Bitbucket repositories package dependency vulnerabilities from Snyk . Works on top of existing GiHub , GitLab or Bitbucket integraions.

notes: Works with GitHub,GitLab and Bitbucket integrations
Vulnerabilities will be displayed as Application vulnerabilities in metrics bar

UCV.name: SonarQube
UCV.description: SonarQube is an open source tool suite to measure and analyze the quality of source code. It focuses on the following  code quality areas, which are referred to as the “7 axes of code quality”: comments, architecture and design,  duplication, coding rules, potential bugs, unit tests, and complexity.

UCV.name: TestNG
UCV.description: TestNG is a testing framework for Java programming. This plug-in provides integration of testing results into the  DevOps Velocity server.

UCV.name: Twistlock
UCV.description: Twistlock provides container security. It is a rule-based access control policy system for Docker and Kubernetes  containers. The Twistlock plug-in imports the Twistlock data in DevOps Velocity metrics.

notes: Corrected incorrectly spelled plugin name: In urbancode deploy plugin, display name was incorrectly spelled as Ubrancode deploy. Now corrected to Urbancode deploy.
Internal Server Error Fix: The urbancode deploy plugin was giving internal server error while syncing the application processes from the UCD server.

Removed UrbanCode Deploy Status Task: Assign status task is removed and made part of main UrbanCode Deploy Task as post deployment success or failure step for assigning Snapshot or Component Version status.
Bug Fix: In previous version - plugin was not syncing more than 100 applications and it was resulting in Snapshot Upload failure.
Sync All Applications at First Sync: Now UCD plugin is syncing all the applications, environments, processes, and components data even if an initial sync date is given.
Deployment Plan Fix: In previous version of plugin deployment plan was not getting completed if we have parallel and sequential tasks with UCD app.
Removing Deleted Applications: In the previous version of plugin the deleted Application processes were also available while selecting the process in the pipeline.
Removed Version as mandatory for external UCD
Using version properties for mapping build.url parameter
Started uploading statuses to Snapshot and Component versions
Rebranding: Name of the plugin is changed from UrbanCode Deploy to IBM DevOps Deploy.

UCV.name: CollabNet VersionOne
UCV.description: CollabNet VersionOne is a web-based project management tool. It manages the entire software development life cycle.

notes: Added support for teams, backlog group, portfolio

UCV.name: Microsoft Visual Studio Testing
UCV.description: Microsoft Visual Studio is a testing framework which is used to define and run unit tests to verify and maintain code integerty.

UCV.name: WhiteSource
UCV.description:
WhiteSource identifies all open source components and their dependencies in software. WhiteSource secures software from vulnerabilities and enforces license policies throughout the software development lifecycle.

The WhiteSource plug-in retrieves WhiteSource scan results and displays the License Risks and Security Vulnerabilities in IBM DevOps Velocity metric displays.

notes: Added custom field mapping for pipeline
Works on product and project level

UCV.name: YAML Executor
UCV.description: The YAML Executor plug-in automates the initial setup process for integrating different CI/CD tools into DevOps Velocity. You can define the integration configurations in a YAML file and apply it in DevOps Velocity to automate the integration process.

notes: Started using timeSpan for Initial Sync date.
Support deletion of generated demo data
Update business value of associated Jira items.
